class.name: ParameterizedWrapper

javadoc.text: Wrapper class enabling {@link FirstOrderDifferentialEquations basic simple}ODE instances to be used when processing {@link JacobianMatrices}.

javadoc.param: ode original first order differential equations

javadoc.text: Get the dimension of the underlying FODE.
Get the current time derivative of the state vector of the underlying FODE.
javadoc.param: t current value of the independent time variable
y array containing the current value of the state vector
yDot placeholder array where to put the time derivative of the state vector
javadoc.exception: MaxCountExceededException if the number of functions evaluations is exceeded
DimensionMismatchException if arrays dimensions do not match equations settings
